title: How to deal with anxiety from the news
description: The news is overwhelming right now. Neuroscientist Judson Brewer shares tips on calming your nerves when the headlines won't stop. Take a break and learn about how to better process worry. (This episode originally aired in October 2020.)
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
